properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens.

properties.name: jwt.cookie
properties.description: Name of the cookie used for storing the JWT token in the login response.

properties.name: spnego.debug
properties.description: Enable debug output during SPGNEGO authentication. It may also be useful to set 'logging.level.org.springframework.security.kerberos: DEBUG'.

properties.name: spnego.enabled
properties.description: Whether or not Kerberos/SPNEGO authentication against ad.primary is enabled for this environment. If disabled, Basic Authentication against oid will be used.

properties.name: spnego.service-principal
properties.description: Service principal defined in Active Directory for this application. Used to verify Kerberos credentials.

properties.name: spnego.keytab
properties.description: Filesystem location of the keytab file used for verification of Kerberos credentials.

properties.name: ad.primary.principal.suffix
properties.description: Domain suffix to be applied to the userPrincipalName in Active Directory eg. JoeBlogs@suffix.

properties.name: ad.secondary.principal.suffix
properties.description: Domain suffix to be applied to the userPrincipalName in Active Directory eg. JoeBlogs@suffix.

properties.name: oid.default-password
properties.description: Default SHA/SSHA hashed password to be used when creating users in OID.

properties.name: delius.secret
properties.description: Shared secret key between National Delius and UMT, to support delegated authentication via request parameters.

properties.name: ad.primary.readonly
properties.description: Whether the primary Active Directory should be marked as readonly. If so, it won't be possible to update user forename/surname in AD.

properties.name: ad.secondary.readonly
properties.description: Whether the secondary Active Directory should be marked as readonly. If so, it won't be possible to update user forename/surname in AD.

properties.name: cache.evict.delay
properties.description: How often the caches should be cleared, in milliseconds. Defaults to 24 hours.
